decks.notes: This UW Control deck aims to control the board through cards like Dovin's Veto and Supreme Verdict, while generating card advantage with Memory Deluge and Omen of the Sea. It also utilizes cards like Stock Up and Temporary Lockdown to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional card advantage and value by blinking permanents. The deck focuses on managing threats and taking incremental advantages until it can establish a strong win condition, whether through a planeswalker ultimate or overwhelming the opponent with card advantage.

This UW Control deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. The deck utilizes Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion to provide additional value. It includes cards like Dovin's Veto and Supreme Verdict for control, along with powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria. The deck also has various utility lands like Field of Ruin and Castle Ardenvale to disrupt the opponent's mana base. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through efficient answers and card draw.

This deck revolves around quickly deploying aggressive artifact creatures, beefing them up with cards like Ensoul Artifact and Shrapnel Blast, and using cards like Torch the Tower and Burst Lightning to control the board and deal direct damage to the opponent. The inclusion of Spell Pierce and Cryptic Coat helps in protecting your creatures and disrupting your opponent's game plan. With a mix of creatures with evasion and direct damage spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast, aggressive strategy while maintaining control of the battlefield.
